definitions.text: the process whereby heat changes something from a solid to a liquid
examples: the power failure caused a refrigerator melt that was a disaster
the thawing of a frozen turkey takes several hours

definitions.text: warm weather following a freeze; snow and ice melt
a relaxation or slackening of tensions or reserve; becoming less hostile
examples: the thaw between the United States and Russia has led to increased cooperation in world affairs

definitions.text: become or cause to become soft or liquid
examples: The giant iceberg dissolved over the years during the global warming phase
